org.mvp4j
Interface AppController

public interface AppController

The application entry to process view class and bind the view instance with it's model and presenter instances.

Method Summary
 MVPBinding bind(java.lang.Object view, java.lang.Object model, java.lang.Object presenter)
           Bind the view to the model instance, the data seized in the view will automatically synchronized with the stored in the model Bind the presenter instance to the view instance, the events happened in the view will automatically call the actions in the presenter throw IllegalArgumentException if the view, model and presenter instances classes are not associated Use the current adapter to bind annotated component in the view with the associated model properties and presenter actions.
 MVPBinding bindModel(java.lang.Object view, java.lang.Object model)
           Bind the view to the model instance, the data seized in the view will automatically synchronized with the stored in the model throw IllegalArgumentException if the model and view instances classes are not associated.
 MVPBinding bindPresenter(java.lang.Object view, java.lang.Object presenter)
           Bind the presenter instance to the view instance, the events happened in the view will automatically call the actions in the presenter throw IllegalArgumentException if the view and presenter instances classes are not associated Use the current adapter to bind annotated component in the view with the associated presenter actions.
 void refreshView(java.lang.Object view)
          Refresh the view with data model associated, if data in model change, the call to this method will if no model associated than do nothing
 void setAdapter(MVPAdapter adapter)
           Set the adapter to support a specific library, you can define a new adapter for a given library, for example : swing, swt, gwt,...
 

Method Detail

bind

MVPBinding bind(java.lang.Object view,
                java.lang.Object model,
                java.lang.Object presenter)

Bind the view to the model instance, the data seized in the view will automatically synchronized with the stored in the model

Bind the presenter instance to the view instance, the events happened in the view will automatically call the actions in the presenter

throw IllegalArgumentException if the view, model and presenter instances classes are not associated

Use the current adapter to bind annotated component in the view with the associated model properties and presenter actions.

Parameters:
model - store the data
view - display the data to the user
presenter - manage the view

bindModel

MVPBinding bindModel(java.lang.Object view,
                     java.lang.Object model)

Bind the view to the model instance, the data seized in the view will automatically synchronized with the stored in the model

throw IllegalArgumentException if the model and view instances classes are not associated.

Use the current adapter to bind annotated component in the view with the associated model properties.

Parameters:
model - store the data
view - display the data to the user

bindPresenter

MVPBinding bindPresenter(java.lang.Object view,
                         java.lang.Object presenter)

Bind the presenter instance to the view instance, the events happened in the view will automatically call the actions in the presenter

throw IllegalArgumentException if the view and presenter instances classes are not associated

Use the current adapter to bind annotated component in the view with the associated presenter actions.

Parameters:
view - display the data to the user
presenter - manage the view

refreshView

void refreshView(java.lang.Object view)
Refresh the view with data model associated, if data in model change, the call to this method will if no model associated than do nothing

Parameters:
view -

setAdapter

void setAdapter(MVPAdapter adapter)

Set the adapter to support a specific library, you can define a new adapter for a given library, for example : swing, swt, gwt,... if no adapter is specified, the default adapter is used.

Parameters:
adapter -
